column2: Role & responsibilities    We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced  Business Development Executive  to join our dynamic team at  Harish Software Solutions . This role is ideal for someone who is passionate about driving business growth through effective lead generation, project acquisition, and developing strong client relationships. The successful candidate will be responsible for managing our marketing team and overseeing the strategic planning of revenue models to ensure sustainable business expansion.  Job Description:   Identify and develop new business opportunities in the market. Secure new projects through active lead generation and strategic outreach. Implement effective strategies for lead generation across various channels. Convert potential leads into successful business deals through persuasive negotiation and relationship management. Manage and lead the marketing team to achieve business and marketing objectives. Foster a collaborative and high-performance team environment. Design and implement robust revenue models that align with company goals. Analyze market trends and adapt revenue strategies to maximize profitability. Build and maintain strong relationships with clients through regular communication and excellent service. Understand client needs and work collaboratively to provide solutions that meet their business objectives. Monitor and report on team performance and project progress to senior management. Ensure all business activities comply with relevant legal and internal policies. Required Skills and Qualifications Bachelors degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Sales, or a related field is required. Masters degree or MBA is highly preferred.  Minimum 4 years of experience in business development, sales, or a related field, with a  proven track record of achieving business growth. Skilled in negotiation and conflict resolution, with the ability to handle sensitive situations  diplomatically..  Ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment. Strategic thinker with exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills. Demonstrated success in roles requiring direct sales, lead generation, and client retention  within a competitive market. Preferred candidate profile   At least 4 to 5 years of professional experience in business development, with a strong background in project acquisition and lead management  Proven track record of meeting or exceeding targets in a previous business development role. Previous work in a multicultural environment or large-scale projects is advantageous. Highly motivated, entrepreneurial spirit with a drive to succeed in a competitive environment.  Ability to handle pressure and meet deadlines without compromising on quality. Perks and benefits   Competitive base salary commensurate with experience and industry standards. Annual performance reviews with the potential for salary adjustments. Attractive incentive bonus structure for exceeding set performance targets. Additional commission-based rewards for each project acquired beyond the initial targets, providing significant earning potential etc.  Note : (Please reach out to us on 7349153780)

column2: Position Overview:  We are seeking a talented and enthusiastic Software Marketing Executive to join our dynamic marketing team. The Software Marketing Executive will play a key role in developing and executing marketing strategies to promote our software products, generate leads, and drive customer engagement. The ideal candidate will have a strong blend of technical knowledge, marketing expertise, and interpersonal skills. Key Responsibilities: Develop and Execute Marketing Strategies:  Collaborate with the marketing team to develop comprehensive marketing strategies that align with business goals and target audience preferences. Execute marketing campaigns across various channels to promote software products effectively. Market Research and Analysis:  Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify market trends, customer needs, and competitive positioning. Use market insights to inform marketing strategies and product positioning. Content Creation and Management:  Create compelling marketing content, including website copy, blog posts, whitepapers, case studies, and product documentation. Manage content creation projects from conception to publication, ensuring accuracy, quality, and relevance. Digital Marketing:  Implement digital marketing techniques such as SEO, SEM, email marketing, social media marketing, and content marketing to increase brand visibility, drive website traffic, and generate leads. Monitor and analyze digital marketing performance metrics to optimize campaign effectiveness. Lead Generation and Nurturing:  Generate leads through various channels, including online campaigns, events, webinars, and partnerships. Develop lead nurturing strategies to engage prospects throughout the sales funnel and convert them into customers. Sales Enablement:  Collaborate with the sales team to develop sales collateral, presentations, and demos that effectively communicate the value proposition of software products. Provide sales support by delivering product training and participating in customer meetings as needed. Customer Relationship Management:  Build and maintain relationships with customers, understand their needs and preferences, and address their concerns effectively. Gather customer feedback and insights to inform product development and marketing strategies. Campaign Tracking and Reporting:  Track and analyze marketing campaign performance using analytics tools and marketing automation platforms. Prepare regular reports and dashboards to communicate key performance metrics, trends, and insights to stakeholders.   Location:  [North Kerala and south kerala] Employment Type:  [Full-time] Benefits:  [Basic salary+TA=DA+Incentives.]

including search engine optimization (SEO), social media marketing, email marketing, and pay-per-click (PPC) advertising     Brand Management: Manage and promote the organization's brand, ensuring consistency in messaging and visual identity     Market Analysis: Analyze marketing data and performance metrics to track the effectiveness of marketing campaigns and make data-driven decisions     Customer Engagement: Foster engagement with customers through various channels, addressing inquiries and providing information     Event Planning: Organize and execute marketing events, trade shows, webinars, and product launches     Public Relations: Manage public relations activities, including press releases, media relations, and reputation management     Lead Generation: Generate and nurture leads to expand the customer base and support sales efforts     Marketing Automation: Use marketing automation tools to streamline marketing campaigns and customer relationship management     Budget Management: Manage marketing budgets, allocate resources effectively, and ensure campaigns are cost-efficient     Competitive Analysis: Monitor and analyze the activities of competitors and adjust marketing strategies accordingly     Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including sales, design, and product development, to align marketing efforts with business objectives     Skills and Qualities:Marketing Knowledge: In-depth knowledge of marketing principles, strategies, and best practices     Creativity: The ability to think creatively and develop innovative marketing campaigns     Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills to convey marketing messages effectively     Analytical Thinking: Strong analytical skills to assess marketing data and make informed decisions     Digital Tools: Proficiency in using various digital marketing tools, analytics platforms, and content management systems     Adaptability: Willingness to adapt to changing market conditions and emerging marketing trends

column2: Job Title: Sales Executive Location: Bharuch, India Position type: Full-time Onsite Company Type: Sales Job Description: We are seeking a keen and result-oriented Sales Executive for our office in Bharuch, India. The incumbent will be responsible for generating, maximizing, and growing sales opportunities within a specified geographic territory.  Responsibilities: 1. Identify potential clients, and the decision makers within the client organization. 2. Research and build relationships with new clients.  3. Plan approaches and pitches; work with team to develop proposals that meet the clients needs, concerns, and objectives. 4. Present new products and services that enhance existing relationships. 5. Grow and retain existing accounts by presenting new solutions and services to clients. 6. Prospect for potential new local and regional clients and turn this into increased business. 7. Work on sales targets and try achieving them systematically. 8. Attend educational workshops; review professional publications; establish personal networks; participate in professional societies to keep a hand on the pulse of the market. Requirements: 1. A bachelor's degree in business administration or related field. 2. Proven sales experience with a track record of over-achieving targets. 3. column2: Market Research: Marketing Associates often conduct market research to gather data and insights about target audiences, customer preferences, and industry trends     This research helps in making informed marketing decisions     Campaign Development: They assist in creating marketing campaigns and strategies     This involves developing promotional materials, content, and messaging that align with the company's goals and target audience     Digital Marketing: Marketing Associates work with various digital marketing channels, including social media, email marketing, online advertising, and content marketing     They may help manage social media accounts, create and schedule posts, and analyze engagement metrics     Content Creation: They may be responsible for creating or assisting in the creation of marketing content, such as blog posts, articles, videos, or graphics     Content is essential for attracting and engaging potential customers     Data Analysis: Marketing Associates often analyze marketing performance data, such as website traffic, email open rates, and conversion rates, to measure the effectiveness of marketing campaigns     They use this data to make improvements and adjustments as needed     Customer Engagement: Engaging with customers and responding to inquiries or comments on social media and other platforms is a common responsibility     Building and maintaining positive customer relationships is a key aspect of marketing     Event Coordination: They may be involved in planning and coordinating marketing events, such as product launches, trade shows, or webinars     Brand Promotion: Marketing Associates work to promote and maintain a positive brand image     This includes ensuring that all marketing materials and communications align with the brand's identity and values

Since all business is about creating and supplying products and services to customers,  marketing draws people from all disciplines. column2: We are looking for an experienced Digital Marketing Executive to assist in the planning,  execution and optimization of our online marketing efforts. The promotion of products and services through digital channels is a complex procedure with great potential which becomes increasingly useful for companies such as ours.    The ideal candidate will have a passion for all things marketing and technology. You will be well- versed in the concepts surrounding digital marketing and how the Internet can become a strong asset to securing growing revenue. You will be tech- savvy and intuitive with great ideas to reinforce our marketing campaign.    Responsibilities: Assist in the formulation of strategies to build a lasting digital connection with consumers    Plan and monitor the ongoing company presence on social media (Twitter,  Facebook etc.)   Launch optimized online adverts through Google Adwords,  Facebook etc. to increase company and brand awareness   Be actively involved in SEO efforts (keyword,  image optimization etc.)   Prepare online newsletters and promotional emails and organize their distribution through various channels   Provide creative ideas for content marketing and update website   Collaborate with designers to improve user experience   Measure performance of digital marketing efforts using a variety of Web analytics tools (Google Analytics,  WebTrends etc.)   Acquire insight in online marketing trends and keep strategies up- to- date   Maintain partnerships with media agencies and vendors    Qualifications/ Pre- Knowledge Requirements: Minimum qualifications: Proven experience as Digital Marketing Executive or similar role   Excellent understanding of digital marketing concepts and best practices   Experience with B2C social media,  Google Adwords and email campaigns and SEO/ SEM   Working knowledge of ad serving tools (e.g.,  DART,  Atlas)   Perfect knowledge of web analytics tools (e.g. Google Analytics,  NetInsight,  WebTrends etc.)   Skills and experience in creative content writing   Analytical mindset and critical thinking   Excellent communication and interpersonal skills   BSc/ BA in marketing or relevant field

column2: Job Description: As a Marketing Intern/Fresher, you will have the opportunity to gain hands-on experience in various aspects of marketing while working closely with experienced professionals. This role is ideal for individuals who are passionate about marketing and eager to learn and grow in a fast-paced environment. Key Responsibilities: Assist in the development and implementation of marketing strategies to promote our products/services. Conduct market research and analysis to identify trends, competitor activities, and customer preferences. Support the creation of marketing collaterals, including brochures, presentations, and digital content. Assist in managing social media channels and online presence, including content creation and engagement. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to execute marketing campaigns and initiatives. Help organize and participate in marketing events, such as product launches, exhibitions, and workshops. Monitor and analyze the performance of marketing activities and provide insights and recommendations for optimization. Stay updated on industry trends and best practices in marketing to contribute fresh ideas and innovative solutions. Requirements: Bachelor's degree (or pursuing final year) from a top-tier business school or equivalent. Strong passion for marketing with a desire to build a career in the field. Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal. Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and familiarity with marketing tools and platforms is a plus. Ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a team. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Proactive attitude with a willingness to take on new challenges and learn quickly. Prior internship or relevant experience in marketing is desirable but not mandatory. Perks and Benefits: Opportunity to work with a talented and dynamic team in a supportive environment. Hands-on experience in various aspects of marketing and exposure to real-world projects. Competitive stipend and potential for future full-time employment based on performance. Networking opportunities with industry professionals and mentors. Fun and vibrant workplace culture with regular team outings and activities.

column2: About the role: As a Channel Marketing Associate, you will be responsible for developing and implementing marketing strategies to drive growth through indirect sales channels. You will collaborate with channel partners, distributors, and internal marketing teams to create and execute campaigns that effectively promote products and enhance brand visibility within the target market. The role involves understanding channel dynamics, building relationships, and optimizing marketing initiatives to achieve business objectives. Role & Responsibilities: The list of role and responsibilities of Channel Marketing Associate are as follows (please note this is general indication of expectations, and not an exhaustive list of duties): Develop Channel Strategy, develop and execute comprehensive channel marketing strategies aligned with overall business goals. Collaborate with sales and product teams to identify key channels and target market segments. Partner Engagement, build and maintain strong relationships with channel partners, distributors, and resellers. Provide support and resources to help partners effectively market and sell products. Campaign Development, plan and execute marketing campaigns to generate demand, increase brand awareness, and drive sales through channel partners. Develop tailored marketing collateral, promotions, and incentive programs for channel partners. Training and Enablement, provide training to channel partners on product features, key selling points, and effective marketing strategies. Develop and maintain a repository of marketing materials to support partner activities. Market Analysis, conduct market research to understand trends, competitive landscape, and customer needs within specific channels. Utilize data and insights to refine marketing strategies and identify new opportunities. Budget Management, develop and manage the channel marketing budget, ensuring efficient allocation of resources to maximize ROI. Monitor and report on the performance of marketing initiatives against budgetary goals. Cross-Functional Collaboration, collaborate with internal teams, including sales, product management, and marketing, to ensure alignment of channel strategies with overall company objectives. Coordinate joint marketing initiatives with partners to amplify the impact of campaigns. Measurement and Reporting, establish key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the success of channel marketing efforts. Provide regular reports and analysis on the effectiveness of campaigns and make data-driven recommendations for improvements. Required Skills Minimum 3 years of proven experience in Channel Marketing of ITSM / AIOPs products. Strong understanding of indirect sales channels and partner ecosystems. Creative thinking and the ability to develop innovative marketing programs Communication skills - this role requires communicating effectively, so strong interpersonal and communication skills are a must for success. Teamwork - channel marketing associates often collaborate with a team and other departments or external contacts. For this reason, it's important that they're polite, professional, and courteous with colleagues, and that they work well in a team. Organization skills - channel marketing associate often work with different colleagues and teams on multiple projects at one time, so the ability to prioritize tasks and stay organized is essential. Analytical abilities - channel marketing associate analyze data, observe trends, and report and evaluate the success of campaigns and social engagement, which requires strong analytical abilities. Must be able to travel. Must hold bachelors degree, an MBA will be preferred. Possess high energy and driven to be achieve results. This is a Work from office position, based in Ahmedabad, Gujarat
column11: marketing, Channel Marketing, Marketing Communication

column2: Market Research: Marketing Associates often conduct market research to gather data and insights about target audiences, customer preferences, and industry trends     This research helps in making informed marketing decisions     Campaign Development: They assist in creating marketing campaigns and strategies     This involves developing promotional materials, content, and messaging that align with the company's goals and target audience     Digital Marketing: Marketing Associates work with various digital marketing channels, including social media, email marketing, online advertising, and content marketing     They may help manage social media accounts, create and schedule posts, and analyze engagement metrics     Content Creation: They may be responsible for creating or assisting in the creation of marketing content, such as blog posts, articles, videos, or graphics     Content is essential for attracting and engaging potential customers     Data Analysis: Marketing Associates often analyze marketing performance data, such as website traffic, email open rates, and conversion rates, to measure the effectiveness of marketing campaigns     They use this data to make improvements and adjustments as needed     Customer Engagement: Engaging with customers and responding to inquiries or comments on social media and other platforms is a common responsibility     Building and maintaining positive customer relationships is a key aspect of marketing     Event Coordination: They may be involved in planning and coordinating marketing events, such as product launches, trade shows, or webinars     Brand Promotion: Marketing Associates work to promote and maintain a positive brand image     This includes ensuring that all marketing materials and communications align with the brand's identity and values
column11: Graphics, Data analysis, Email marketing, Social media, Marketing campaigns, Market research, Digital marketing, Customer engagement, Event marketing, Marketing Associate

column2: Nine Digital, a digital marketing company in New Delhi is looking for a Digital marketing analyst who will be responsible for working with a portfolio of clients to assist in: defining and implementing measurement strategies that align with clientsmarketing and business objectives, producing meaningful marketing KPI dashboards and delivering monthly, cross channel performance reports with actionable insight. The role will also involve conducting conversion & optimization consulting, with the aim of improving efficiency in clientsdigital marketing strategies and increase in ROI.   Job Description: Digital Marketing Analyst   Identifying client objectives and advising on suitable measurement strategies   Using methodical performance analysis to influence/support campaign strategies   Reporting and Analysis   Developing custom marketing dashboard concepts for client reporting via Excel   Reporting on key metrics, analysing and interpreting trends and providing actionableinsights based on available analytics data   Performing ROI analysis to evaluate efficiency and effectiveness of differentmarketing campaigns.   Client focus   Delivering regular reporting and analysis documentation to clients and presentingfindings or test results.   Analytical and technical   Providing consultancy on campaign tagging and additional on-site tracking   Using available data sources to deep dive and troubleshoot campaign (and overall),performance issues and propose methodical optimisation tests, both on-site andcampaign based.   Job Specifications:   Experience with creation of marketing dashboard reports   2-4 years experience with digital marketing and technology and e-commerce, including webanalytics, email marketing, search marketing, social media, as well as conversion marketing.   Fluency with PowerPoint and Excel   Experience with analytics tools (e.g. Google Analytics, Other), A/B and multivariate testing, andMulti-channel (online and offline) attribution and testing experience a plus.   Strong communication and interpersonal skills.   Willingness to grow your skills in a collaborative, team-oriented, fast-paced environment

column2: As a Telephonic Marketing/Sales Professional, your primary responsibility will be to connect with potential customers over the phone and persuade them to purchase products or services offered by your organization      You will play a crucial role in driving revenue and achieving sales targets      This position requires excellent communication skills, a customer-focused approach, and the ability to work independently        Key Responsibilities:        Lead Generation: Identify and target potential customers through various sources, including cold calling, warm leads, and referrals      Product/Service Knowledge: Develop a deep understanding of the products or services your organization offers, as well as the features and benefits      Be prepared to answer customer questions and objections effectively      Customer Engagement: Initiate and maintain meaningful conversations with prospects      Build rapport and trust to create a positive customer experience      Sales Pitch: Deliver persuasive sales pitches tailored to the needs and preferences of each prospect      Highlight the value proposition and unique selling points of your products or services      Objection Handling: Address customer objections and concerns professionally and confidently      Overcome objections to close sales successfully      Closing Deals: Effectively guide prospects through the sales process and close deals by obtaining commitment and agreement from customers      Record Keeping: Maintain accurate and detailed records of customer interactions, including contact information, preferences, and sales outcomes, using CRM software or other designated tools      Targets and Quotas: Meet or exceed monthly and quarterly sales targets and quotas set by the organization      Follow-Up: Conduct follow-up calls to nurture leads and convert prospects into customers      Maintain ongoing relationships with existing customers to encourage repeat business      Market Research: Stay informed about industry trends, competitor products/services, and customer needs to adapt your sales strategies and messaging accordingly      Feedback: Provide valuable feedback to the marketing and product development teams based on customer insights and needs      Compliance: Adhere to all relevant regulations and guidelines governing telephonic sales and marketing activities      Qualifications:High school diploma or equivalent; a bachelor's degree in marketing, sales, or a related field is a plus      Proven experience in telephonic sales or telemarketing      Strong communication and interpersonal skills      Excellent negotiation and persuasion abilities      Familiarity with CRM software and sales tools      Self-motivated with a results-driven mindset Willingness to adapt and learn in a dynamic sales environment

column2: Role & responsibilities   The Assistant Territory Manager for B2B sales plays a pivotal role in driving sales and revenue growth within their assigned territory. This position involves proactive field sales activities, including client prospecting, meetings, and presentations, to drive revenue growth and achieve sales targets. This role requires a combination of sales expertise, relationship-building skills, and strategic thinking to effectively penetrate markets and drive business growth. Support the Regional Manager in developing and executing sales plans to achieve sales targets within the assigned territory.  Identify and prospect new B2B & B2CH within the territory.  Build and maintain strong relationships with existing clients through visits to ensure high levels of customer satisfaction and retention.  Conduct product demonstrations and presentations to potential clients, highlighting the value proposition and benefits of the company's products.  Collaborate with internal teams and Internal Sales Managers to address client needs and concerns, focusing on growing the sales.  Prepare and present sales reports, forecasts, and analysis to management on a regular basis  Participate in sales meetings, conferences, and industry events to network and promote company offerings.  Assist in resolving client issues and escalations in a timely and satisfactory manner.  Gather Market Intelligence information during the Field Visit of the customers / suspects visit . Key Performance Indicators (KPIs):  Sales Revenue: Achieving or exceeding sales targets within the assigned territory.  New Customers: Number of new customers acquired through field sales efforts (B2B customers). Key Result Area (KRA):  Territory Management: Effectively manage and prioritize field sales activities within the assigned territory.  Client Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with clients to drive loyalty and repeat business.  Outstation Days: Grow presence through visits in the designated territories. Minimum 12 days outstation travel.  Sales Efficiency: Ratio of field sales activities to closed deals.  Average revenue per customer . Preferred candidate profile   Past experience in Field sales preferably B2B and Product Segment

column2: MARKETING EXECUTIVE:   Marketing executives are involved in developing marketing campaigns to promote a product,  service or idea. It is a varied role that includes planning,  advertising,  public relations,  event organization,  product development,  distribution,  sponsorship and research. The work is often challenging and fast- paced. Marketing executives contribute to and develop integrated marketing campaigns. Tasks can involves networking with a range of stakeholders including customers,  colleagues,  suppliers and partner organizations. Communicating with target audiences and managing customer relationships; sourcing advertising opportunities and placing adverts in the press -  local,  regional,  national and specialist publications.

column2: We are looking for a highly motivated and proactive Field Marketing Executive to join our team. As a Field Marketing Executive, you will play a crucial role in promoting our products and services through various marketing activities in the field. You will be responsible for executing marketing campaigns, building relationships with customers, and increasing brand awareness. If you have a passion for marketing, excellent communication skills, and enjoy working in a dynamic environment, we want to hear from you.     Responsibilities      Develop and implement field marketing strategies to promote our products and services effectively.     Conduct market research to identify target customer segments and understand their needs and preferences.     Plan and execute on-ground marketing activities, including product demonstrations, roadshows, trade shows, and other promotional events.     Build and maintain strong relationships with existing and potential customers to enhance brand loyalty and increase sales.     Collaborate with the marketing team to create compelling marketing materials, such as brochures, flyers, and signage.     Coordinate with sales teams to ensure alignment between marketing activities and sales objectives.     Monitor and analyze the effectiveness of field marketing initiatives and provide timely reports and recommendations.     Stay updated with industry trends and the competitive landscape to identify new marketing opportunities.     Provide feedback and insights from the field to the marketing and product teams to drive continuous improvement.     Represent the company at industry events and conferences to network and promote our brand.     Requirements      Proven experience in field marketing or a similar role.     Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.     Strong knowledge of marketing principles and techniques.     Ability to work independently and proactively in a fast-paced environment.     Well-organized with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.     Flexibility to travel and work in different locations as required.     Proficiency in using Microsoft Office and marketing software/tools.     Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and generate insights.     Creative thinker with the ability to develop innovative marketing strategies.     Bachelor s degree in marketing, business, or a related field.
column11: Sales, Field marketing, Analytical, Market research, Brand awareness, Promotional events, MS Office, Marketing Executive, Continuous improvement

Flexibility to adapt to changing market dynamics and customer requirements.      A bachelors degree in marketing, business administration, or a related field is preferred.

column2: Our organization is excited to announce that we are looking for a talented and experienced Marketing Executive for our Marketing department.      As a Marketing Executive, you will be responsible for developing marketing strategies and campaigns for products and services. You will also be responsible for supervising the marketing plans along with the Marketing Manager.      To be successful in this job role, you should have extensive marketing experience with great market research skills. You should be helping the team in planning and executing marketing materials based on the requirements. Your main aim will be achieving company objectives and improving their profitability.      You should be preparing a good and effective marketing budget on a monthly basis. In addition to this, you should possess great communication skills and the ability to manage multiple tasks. You should also possess amazing customer service skills and phenomenal people management skills.      If your experience and skills match our criteria for the role of Marketing Executive, apply for this job now. We will love to meet you.            Responsibilities            Developing and implementing effective marketing strategies and objectives.          Performing marketing research as per the current requirements.          Working in collaboration with the Digital Marketing team or other team members.          Creating marketing campaigns to promote the products and services of the company.          Exploring various advertising opportunities.          Preparing marketing materials such as brochures, pamphlets, and others.          Monitoring marketing activities and improving their performance.          Maintaining a healthy relationship with the publishers and vendors as well.          Developing marketing reports on a monthly basis and presenting them to the Marketing Manager.          Attending brainstorming sessions, daily stand-ups, regular meetings as well as meeting with clients.          Preparing marketing budget and financial strategies according to the organization s goals.          Assisting in hiring and training marketing staff if required.          Adhering to all the rules and regulations of the company.            Requirements            Bachelor s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field.          Working experience as a Marketing Executive, Marketing Assistant, or a similar role in the Marketing department.          Strong working experience in strategic marketing planning.          Proficiency in Marketing software or MS Office tools.          Hands-on experience with social media platforms such as Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, and others.          Ability to work under pressure and prioritize tasks.          Outstanding analytical, interpersonal, and organizational skills.          Excellent networking skills.          Strong work ethics.          Exceptional oral and written communication skills.          Ability to work in a team or individually as and when required.          Ability to manage and handle multiple tasks.          Outstanding problem-solving skills.          Exceptional attention to detail.          Hard-working individual.          Good time management abilities.          Strong decision-making skills.
column11: Strategic marketing planning, Networking, People management skills, Analytical, Social media, MS Office tools, Market research, Digital marketing, Marketing budget, Monitoring
